heroSection.heading: Connect with Hakika Neighbours, Grow Your Business
heroSection.paragraph: Join the waitlist for Jirani Connect to be notified when our local eCommerce platform launches. Support Hakika Estate businesses and be the first to engage. Sign up now!

discoverSection.heading: DISCOVER NEIGHBORS
discoverSection.paragraph: Jirani Connect is a platform designed to foster community connections with Hakika Estate. It allows residents to showcase their businesses and goods, making it easier for neighbors to discover and support local enterprises. Whether you’re looking to expand your business reach or simply prefer to buy from trusted neighbors, Jirani Connect bridges the gap, creating a thriving local economy.

cards.title: Sign Up
cards.description: Create an account and set up a profile for your business. Add details about what you offer and how neighbors can reach you.

cards.title: Post Your Goods & Services
cards.description: List your products or services,including descriptions, prices,and availability. Make your business known within the community.

cards.title: Connect with Neighbors
cards.description: Engage with other residents  who are interested in what you offer. Facilitate transactions and build lasting relationships with your customers.

cards.title: Support Local Businesses
cards.description: Help local entrepreneurs thrive by buying from neighbors. Your support strengthens the local economy and fosters a sense of community.

cards.title: Convenient Access
cards.description: Easily find and purchase goods and services from trusted neighbors. Enjoy the convenience of local shopping without the hassle of traveling far.

cards.title: Grow Your Business Locally
cards.description: Expand your customer base within the community. Gain valuable exposure and increase sales by connecting with neighbors who value your offerings.

cards.title: Build Stronger Relationships
cards.description: Strengthen connections with neighbors through mutual support. Building strong relationships enhances trust and creates a friendly, supportive environment.

ctaCard.headline: Stay updated with Jirani Connect
ctaCard.description: Be the first to experience Jirani Connect, our upcoming local eCommerce platform for Hakika Estate. Think it’s a great idea? Join our waitlist to be notified when we launch. Sign up now to access the platform early and engage with local businesses. Don’t miss out—secure your spot today!
